section.heading: Naval battalion not affected.
section.text: Nothing contained in this subtitle shall be held to alter the status or organization of the naval battalion as now provided for by law.

annoGroup.heading: Emergency Legislation
annoGroup.annotation: For temporary (90 day) addition, see § 2 of National Guard Tuition Assistance Clarification Congressional Review Emergency Act of 2010 (D.C. Act 18-387, May 5, 2010, 57 DCR 4325).

annoGroup.heading: Editor's Notes
annoGroup.annotation: The reference to “this subtitle” in this section includes all sections of Subtitle I of Title 49 except §§ 49-217, 49-303, and 49-906.
